name: Triple Threat
description:
Xbox controller required.

The world of Triple Threat is one of good and evil and magic and fighting. Castle Superbeast is seated on top of a snowy mountain surrounded by ghost towns and vast forests.  Play as three legendary heroes from history sent from Valhalla on a mission to defeat the evil Undead Cabal that has taken over Castle Superbeast and razed the nearby villages to the ground. Utilize the power of the soul gem to freely switch between three unique heroes to finish your quest.

Created by:
Thomas Puckett
Kaitlyn Monroe
Samir Hossain
Kevin Hacker
